Title: Cross-Site Scripting in TYPO3 CMS
Description: Failing to properly encode user input, several places of the TYPO3 CMS are vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.16, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.6.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.16 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.6.1
